remarks.format: ## Remarks 你可以使用类重写默认使用来进行编码和解码中类方法的字符串，如类， ，和。You can use the class to override the class that is used by default to encode and decode strings in methods of classes such as , , and . 在类，在安全列表中找不到的所有字符进行都编码的和方法。In the class, all characters that are not found in the safe list are encoded by the and methods. 若要替换类，该类具有类中，使用其进行注册`encoderType`在 Web.config 文件中，如下面的示例中所示的 httpRuntime 元素的属性：To replace the class with the class, register it using the `encoderType` attribute of the httpRuntime element in the Web.config file, as shown in following example: ``` ``` 有关注释中找不到对不同的编码方法的默认安全字符的列表， ， ， ，和方法。A list of default safe characters for different encoding methods can be found in the remarks for the , , , and methods. 可以通过修改默认安全列表方法。The default safe list can be modified by using the method.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 此方法将除安全列表中的所有字符都编码。This method encodes all characters except those that are in the safe list. > [!NOTE] > 加上引号 ("") 围绕之前将其添加到级联样式表生成的字符串。Put quotation marks (" ") around the resulting string before you add it to a cascading style sheet. 下表列出的默认安全字符。The following table lists the default safe characters. |Unicode 代码图Unicode code chart|字符Character(s)|描述Description| |------------------------|--------------------|-----------------| |[C0 控件和基本拉丁语C0 Controls and Basic Latin](http://www.unicode.org/charts/PDF/U0000.pdf)|A-ZA-Z|大写的字母字符Uppercase alphabetic characters| |[C0 控件和基本拉丁语C0 Controls and Basic Latin](http://www.unicode.org/charts/PDF/U0000.pdf)|a-za-z|小写字母字符Lowercase alphabetic characters| |[C0 控件和基本拉丁语C0 Controls and Basic Latin](http://www.unicode.org/charts/PDF/U0000.pdf)|0-90-9|号码Numbers| 下表列出输入和相应的已编码的输出的示例。The following table lists examples of inputs and the corresponding encoded outputs. ||| |-|-| |`alert('XSS Attack!');`|`alert\000028\000027XSS\000020Attack\000021\000027\000029\00003B`| |`user@contoso.com`|`user\000040contoso\00002Ecom`| |`Anti-Cross Site Scripting Namespace`|`Anti\00002DCross\000020Site\000020Scripting\000020Namespace`| CSS 字符转义序列包含一个反斜杠字符 (\\) 跟最多六个十六进制数字表示的字符的代码中的 ISO 10646 标准。The CSS character escape sequence consists of a backslash character (\\) followed by up to six hexadecimal digits that represent a character code from the ISO 10646 standard. （ISO 10646 标准相当有效地为 Unicode。）不是十六进制数字的任意字符终止转义序列。(The ISO 10646 standard is effectively equivalent to Unicode.) Any character other than a hexadecimal digit terminates the escape sequence. 如果遵循此转义序列字符也是有效的十六进制数字，它必须在转义序列中包括六位数字，或者使用空白字符终止转义序列。If a character that follows the escape sequence is also a valid hexadecimal digit, it must either include six digits in the escape sequence or use a whitespace character to terminate the escape sequence. 例如，`\000020`表示空间。For example, `\000020` denotes a space.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 安全列表会影响所有 HTML XML、 CSS 和 URL 编码的方法。The safe list affects all HTML XML, CSS, and URL encoding methods. 一些例外情况，Unicode 代码图表不直接对应的书面语言。With some exceptions, Unicode code charts do not directly correspond to written languages. 若要添加特定语言或一组语言的支持，通常需要将多个代码图表标记为安全。To add support for a specific language or set of languages often requires marking multiple code charts as safe. 若要添加的日语语言的支持，同时继续允许英语，使用以下语法：To add support for the Japanese language while continuing to allow English, use the following syntax: ``` MarkAsSafe( LowerCodeCharts.Default, LowerMidCodeCharts.HangulJamo, MidCodeCharts.None, UpperMidCodeCharts.CjkRadicalsSupplement | UpperMidCodeCharts.CjkSymbolsAndPunctuation | UpperMidCodeCharts.Hiragana | UpperMidCodeCharts.Katakana | UpperMidCodeCharts.KatakanaPhoneticExtensions | UpperMidCodeCharts.LatinExtendedD | UpperMidCodeCharts.CjkUnifiedIdeographs, UpperCodeCharts.None); ``` > [!NOTE] > 必须调用方法`Application_Start`Global.asax 文件中的方法。The method must be called in the `Application_Start` method in the Global.asax file.

`file:`), the authority (for example, `www.northwind.com` or `www.contoso.com:8080`), or the query or fragment (for example, `?v=s978dfs9#x=103`). 如果没有任何方案或字符串中的证书颁发机构，则假定该字符串为相对路径，并且编码路径。If there is encoded: `http://www.contoso.com:8080/default.htm?v=s978dfs9#x=103`
